overview: TRACKLIST:  01. Breathe Until We Are No More  02. Extinct (with Derrick Green)  03. Night Eternal  04. Opium  05. The Last Of Us  06. tagline: Live at Rock in Rio, Cidade do Rock, Rio de Janeiro, Brazil - 19.sep.2013.
title: Moonspell: Rock in Rio 2015
